column1: Art Institute of Chicago////This place is HUGE! Plan to spend a good couple of hours here
column2: it has a huge variety of works from different periods
column4: and mediums. Saw the Van Gogh exhibition
column6: which showed a glimpse into his work on the Bedroom
column7: with an installation of what the room looked like in real life. A much smaller exhibit
column8: but worth it for the extra $5.
